meanings.definition: The process in which a crystal grows on a substrate.
meanings.sent1: Epitaxies occur when a crystal forms on a surface.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study epitaxies to understand crystal growth.
meanings.sent3: The epitaxies on the glass looked like tiny ice sculptures.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for epitaxies was as natural as a flower blooming.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of epitaxies under the microscope was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The growth of a crystal that mimics the structure of the substrate.
meanings.sent1: The epitaxies mirrored the pattern of the base material.
meanings.sent2: Epitaxies can replicate the shape of the underlying surface.
meanings.sent3: The epitaxies seemed to be playing a game of copycat.
meanings.sent4: The epitaxies were like reflections in a crystal-clear lake.
meanings.sent5: The precision of epitaxies matching the substrate was remarkable.

meanings.definition: The method of depositing a thin film on a substrate.
meanings.sent1: Epitaxies involve coating a surface with a thin layer.
meanings.sent2: In manufacturing, epitaxies are used to create thin films.
meanings.sent3: The epitaxies process felt like painting with invisible ink.
meanings.sent4: The epitaxies technique was like spreading frosting on a cake.
meanings.sent5: The art of epitaxies transformed the substrate into something new.
